Package edu.ncsu.csc216.stp.model.test_plans

Class FailingTestList

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.stp.model.test_plans.AbstractTestPlan
edu.ncsu.csc216.stp.model.test_plans.FailingTestList
public class FailingTestList extends AbstractTestPlan
Extends Abstract Test Plan to hold failing test cases for all projects currently available in the system.
Author:
Bryan Phillips, Diego Sarria

    • setTestPlanName

      public void setTestPlanName(String testPlanName)
      Sets the test plan name to the constant value of "Failing Tests". If the given parameter is not the constant then an IAE is thrown.
      Overrides:
      setTestPlanName in class AbstractTestPlan
      Parameters:
      testPlanName - name to set the test plan name to
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the testPlanName doesn't match the constant

    • getTestCasesAsArray
